website_summaries.verdict: An eye-catching four-person patio set for a very reasonable price, and users rave about the sturdy chairs.
pros: Unlike some sets, an umbrella is included
cons: The umbrella is not weighted down
Some may wish to purchase a separate weighted base

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal this 6 piece set is. Very sturdy and a beautiful red.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Newman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together with the instructions provided
customer_reviews.text: Just received my dining set yesterday and put it together. Easy to put together with the instructions provided. Totally worth what was paid for it. Chairs are sturdy and comfortable, table top seems solid once together. I also did order the weight for the umbrella seeing it does not come with this set and has to be purchased separately. Overall a very good value for a first time home owner with a deck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but for this great price, I don't mind
customer_reviews.text: total bargain! The chairs alone are worth $96.00. I will have to get a base for the umbrella, but for this great price, I don't mind :-)
customer_reviews.author: Janet Boatright

customer_reviews.title: No weight, stake, or other device to hold the umbrella down.
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer should really stop being so cheap and add a weight or other device to keep the umbrella in place.
customer_reviews.author: Initiate

customer_reviews.title: Happy wit h this set.
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly on my deck. Love the color. Happy that the chairs fold up and can be put away for the winter without taking much space. Quick delivery . Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Fox

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: Love the table set. The set is sturdy and stylish I love having outside dinners and drinks. Sometimes we just sit outside and enjoy the comfort. The price was higher than I wanted. It was on sale at Walmart, but I didn't mind too much.
customer_reviews.author: Eloise Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product definitely worth the money. It was easy to assemble and I love how easy to clean the chairs are.
customer_reviews.author: Reina Molina

customer_reviews.title: It arrived damaged!
customer_reviews.text: The table and chairs are good but the umbrella was damage! There is no way to repair it. The box arrived partially torn open! You have to buy an umbrella base in order to use it. It’s not bad for the price except for the damage. I’m waiting to hear from the third party seller to see if they are going to replace the umbrella! Update: I received a refund from the seller so I give them credit for stepping up and doing the right thing!
customer_reviews.author: Therese Sorrentino

customer_reviews.title: Mainstay Table and Chairs
customer_reviews.text: We love this set. It is easy to assemble. The table and chairs are strong and strudy. The umbrella is a nice size. We placed the bottom in a heavy base so it will not blow away easily. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's all in the assembly !
customer_reviews.text: Good value The red pops Chairs sturdy and comfy Need to get a stand for the umbrella All the screw and bolts and nuts included
customer_reviews.author: Liz N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little set
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is great. I don’t use it often, but so far it is a great addition to my patio. I have noticed that the chairs have started to rust a small amount after sitting over night in only two rainy nights. I store the chairs inside - which is easy since they fold up.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Good out doors seating.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for the price, had to send one set back because of bent chair.
customer_reviews.author: Starpatsky

customer_reviews.title: My first outdoor dining set
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase! & love the bright red color. Easy to assemble. I purchased an umbrella light for the table set & it provides so much light. I’m ready to have something at my place before summer is over !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my items!
customer_reviews.text: In love with this product! Easy to put together and my goodness I was so excited about the quickness of delivery!! Thank you for such wonderful costumer service! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Little

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price but the umbrella's are to small.. only covers the table.. can't use when raining.. water drips on all the chairs. Would be nice if the umbrella tilted also.. But for the price cant' be beat.. and the chairs are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Twaddle

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the buy. Easy to put together. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rae

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I would rate it a 5 but, as you can see in my picture, the string on the chair was already coming undone. Also, the plastic on the chairs were literally intertwined with the screw keeping it together so it leaves an ugly plastic look to it.
customer_reviews.author: Dulce Dee

customer_reviews.title: How my patio looks looks now.
customer_reviews.text: It adds a perfect touch to my potion that had become dull & really perks it up. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Florence B. Sage

customer_reviews.title: Cute set
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice love my new set had to get help assembling tho screws was hard to screw together 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute set but ....
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this set but the umbrella came with a black stain and small tear. Didn’t feel like hassling with send back . Overall really cute set
customer_reviews.author: amy worley

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Beautiful red
customer_reviews.text: It’s absolutely beautiful. Easy to put together. Love the red color. It was worth the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Lina Colagrande

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Easy to assemble. Seats are big enough and sturdy, they even looked good after heavy rain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Size
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the price. I am extremely happy with the purchase. I have a small patio area. This is the perfect size. It is big enough to sit comfortable but does not take up my full patio space, which I was afraid of.
customer_reviews.author: Angiewoo

customer_reviews.title: Patio set
customer_reviews.text: The table was a quick assembly! Both table and chairs in perfect condition. Was exactly as pictured and perfect for patio. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Chairs were comfortable. Surprised at the quality for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Would not buy ever again. Most of pieces were damaged. Waste of money, pure garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller patio
customer_reviews.text: Tabel is good. You need to order the base for the umbrella, its not included
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Callaghan

customer_reviews.title: Materials are very cheap,glass is very thin we are not satisfied by this item
customer_reviews.text: Home , after tow week chair fabric tears Metal it’s weak
customer_reviews.author: mohammad sayah

customer_reviews.title: Messed up table
customer_reviews.text: This set came without directions and all the wrong srews.
customer_reviews.author: Colette Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Love my patio set red color makes everything pop ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Kelly

customer_reviews.title: BEST PATIO DINING SET FOR THE PRICE!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this patio dining set! It is very high quality and a great value! The chairs are very comfortable and sturdy. The assembly was easy. After reading the reviews prior to buying, I did also purchase a umbrella weight. The set is such a cute addition to my summer patio. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PATTI ANNE HAMILTON

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt last long
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the set did not hold up. 2 months after purchase the glass on the table shattered. I will be purchasing a metal table or replacing with a plastic table with umbrella hole. I really wanted to like this set and waited to put a review but I am very disappointed the tempered glass would shatter with little reason too. It did come with dents that I didnt think was a big deal maybe users should report damage to prevent this issue. Set up was good and the chairs are mediocerely comfortable. The table was really the best part and I am very upset. 60 days for a table seems like a bad buy. I'd go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Received it today and we are excited for another spot to relax in these quarantine days and summer outdoor dining fun. Very easy to assemble. Value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Ram

product_meta.title: Mainstays Albany Lane 6-Piece Folding Dining Set (Includes Dining table, Folding chairs and Umbrella), Red

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars151 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
